languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, наш хор астропатов получил послание с Даргонуса. Дворянские дома выражают благодарность за восстановление торговых маршрутов с уцелевшими планетами фон Валанциус и выражают глубочайшие соболезнования в связи с утратой миров, не переживших темные времена".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, наш хор астропатов получил послание с Даргонуса. Дворянские дома выражают благодарность за восстановление торговых маршрутов с уцелевшими планетами фон Валанциус и выражают глубочайшие соболезнования в связи с утратой миров, не переживших темные времена".
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Lord Captain, our Astropathic Choir received a message from Dargonus. The noble houses express their gratitude for the restoration of trade routes between the remaining von Valancius planets and express their deepest condolences for the loss of the worlds that did not survive these dark times."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, наш хор астропатов получил послание с Даргонуса. Дворянские дома выражают благодарность за восстановление торговых маршрутов с уцелевшими планетами фон Валанциус и выражают глубочайшие соболезнования в связи с утратой миров, не переживших темные времена".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, our Astropathic Choir received a message from Dargonus. The noble houses express their gratitude for the restoration of trade routes between the remaining von Valancius planets and express their deepest condolences for the loss of the worlds that did not survive these dark times."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: “舰长大人，我们的星语唱诗班收到了来自达戈努斯的信息。众多贵族家族由衷感谢我们恢复了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝众多行星之间的贸易路线，并向那些未能在这黑暗时期幸免于难的世界致以最深切的哀悼。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, our Astropathic Choir received a message from Dargonus. The noble houses express their gratitude for the restoration of trade routes between the remaining von Valancius planets and express their deepest condolences for the loss of the worlds that did not survive these dark times."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我们的星语唱诗班收到了来自达戈努斯的信息。众多贵族家族由衷感谢我们恢复了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝众多行星之间的贸易路线，并向那些未能在这黑暗时期幸免于难的世界致以最深切的哀悼。”
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, el Coro de Astrópatas ha recibido un mensaje desde Dargonus. Las casas nobles agradecen la restauración de las rutas comerciales con los otros mundos de la dinastía von Valancius y expresan su más sentido pésame por los mundos que no han sobrevivido a estos tiempos aciagos».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, our Astropathic Choir received a message from Dargonus. The noble houses express their gratitude for the restoration of trade routes between the remaining von Valancius planets and express their deepest condolences for the loss of the worlds that did not survive these dark times."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, el Coro de Astrópatas ha recibido un mensaje desde Dargonus. Las casas nobles agradecen la restauración de las rutas comerciales con los otros mundos de la dinastía von Valancius y expresan su más sentido pésame por los mundos que no han sobrevivido a estos tiempos aciagos».
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Lord Captain, unser Astropathischer Chor hat eine Nachricht von Dargonus erhalten. Die Adelshäuser drücken ihre Dankbarkeit für die Wiederherstellung der Handelswege zwischen den verbliebenen von Valancius-Planeten aus und bekunden ihr tiefes Beileid für den Verlust der Welten, die diese dunklen Zeiten nicht überlebt haben."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, our Astropathic Choir received a message from Dargonus. The noble houses express their gratitude for the restoration of trade routes between the remaining von Valancius planets and express their deepest condolences for the loss of the worlds that did not survive these dark times."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, our Astropathic Choir received a message from Dargonus. The noble houses express their gratitude for the restoration of trade routes between the remaining von Valancius planets and express their deepest condolences for the loss of the worlds that did not survive these dark times."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, notre chœur astropathique a reçu un message de Dargonus. Les maisons nobles vous expriment leur gratitude pour le rétablissement des routes commerciales entre les planètes restantes de la dynastie von Valancius et vous adressent leurs plus sincères condoléances pour la disparition des mondes perdus en ces heures sombres. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, our Astropathic Choir received a message from Dargonus. The noble houses express their gratitude for the restoration of trade routes between the remaining von Valancius planets and express their deepest condolences for the loss of the worlds that did not survive these dark times."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, notre chœur astropathique a reçu un message de Dargonus. Les maisons nobles vous expriment leur gratitude pour le rétablissement des routes commerciales entre les planètes restantes de la dynastie von Valancius et vous adressent leurs plus sincères condoléances pour la disparition des mondes perdus en ces heures sombres. »
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、本船の感応通信聖歌隊がダルゴナスからメッセージを受け取りました。貴族達は、フォン・ヴァランシウスが持つ生き残った惑星間の交易ルートが復活したことに感謝して、この暗黒時代を生き延びられず消えていった惑星に対し、深い哀悼の意を表しています」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, our Astropathic Choir received a message from Dargonus. The noble houses express their gratitude for the restoration of trade routes between the remaining von Valancius planets and express their deepest condolences for the loss of the worlds that did not survive these dark times."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、本船の感応通信聖歌隊がダルゴナスからメッセージを受け取りました。貴族達は、フォン・ヴァランシウスが持つ生き残った惑星間の交易ルートが復活したことに感謝して、この暗黒時代を生き延びられず消えていった惑星に対し、深い哀悼の意を表しています」
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Astropatik Koromuz, Dargonus'tan bir mesaj aldı Lord Kaptan. Soylu haneler, kalan von Valancius gezegenleri ile yeniden ticaret rotaları kurulması konusunda teşekkürlerini iletiyor ve bu karanlık zamanlardan geçerken hayatta kalamayan dünyalar için en derin taziyelerini sunuyor."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, our Astropathic Choir received a message from Dargonus. The noble houses express their gratitude for the restoration of trade routes between the remaining von Valancius planets and express their deepest condolences for the loss of the worlds that did not survive these dark times."
